metadata.synopsis: Dialog with the masked victim in Blushing Mermaid cellar for when players talk to it while wearing a hag mask.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I- Talk to S_LOW_BlushingMermaid_MaskedVictim_03_0406349d-d0fc-4bf5-8d18-5b8b8c9e6456

0.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
0.text: The baby - do you hear the baby crying? Oh, never mind. Auntie got it.
0.context: NodeContext: dreamy, creepy out of it -

1.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
1.text: Make Auntie give him back! Make her give me back my baby.
1.context: NodeContext: this should be freaky as hell - panicked, frantic, emotional

2.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
2.text: Auntie says I can see the baby when it's time. But I have to be good.
2.context: NodeContext: this should be freaky as hell - panicked, frantic, emotional

3.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
3.text: Auntie has my baby! Where is he? Where is my baby?!
3.context: NodeContext: this should be freaky as hell - panicked, frantic, emotional
